Macros
FAN_KICKSTART_TIME
#define FAN_KICKSTART_TIME <msecs>

Set fan kickstart time

Description

When first starting the main fan, run it at full speed for the given number of milliseconds.  This gets the fan spinning reliably before setting a PWM value. (Does not work with software PWM for fan on Sanguinololu)

FAN_MIN_PWM
#define FAN_MIN_PWM {
1-255
}

Set minimum fan PWM level

Description

This defines the minimal speed for the main fan, run in PWM mode to enable uncomment and set minimal PWM speed for reliable running (1-255) if fan speed is [1 - (FAN_MIN_PWM-1)] it is set to FAN_MIN_PWM

NUMERIC_ERROR_MESSAGES

Enable substitution of error messages with numeric codes

Description

For this to work, a file named `message_ids.` must be present in the source directory.  For each MSG_* string defined in the firmware, the file must define a corresponding numeric code as MSG_*_ID.
